definitions.text: the property possessed by a line or surface that departs from the vertical
examples: the tower had a pronounced tilt
the ship developed a list to starboard
he walked with a heavy inclination to the right

definitions.text: to incline or bend from a vertical position

examples: He leaned his rifle against the wall

definitions.text: have a tendency or disposition to do or be something; be inclined
examples: She tends to be nervous before her lectures
We can lean on this man

definitions.text: cause to lean to the side

examples: you can't be too rich or too thin
Yon Cassius has a lean and hungry look

definitions.text: lacking in mineral content or combustible material
